snippet.title: Atari 2600 Longplay [001] E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by:  Tsunao

What better way to give the first Atari 2600 longplay than to play the GREATEST! GAEM! EVAR!! If you don't realize this is the GREATEST! GAEM! EVAR!!, then there's something wrong with you.

It is said this and Pac-Man were responsible for the North American video game crash of 1983. It is also said that unsold E.T. carts (and other Atari gaemz) were dumped in a landfill, never to be seen again.

The goal: find 3 telephone pieces, phone home, and wait at landing zone. Along the way to stop E.T. are FBI agents or something (steal telephone pieces) and scientists (drags E.T. to the lab. Can be escaped). There are also Reese Pieces, which restores "health" (the number on the bottom) or give to Elliot to increase score (giving him 9 will make all humans on screen go away and nets one telephone piece). There are also zones that you can use "powers", with "Call Ship" being one.
Game...is...endless.

"FOR GREAT JUSTICE!!", me on doing this game. -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
